author: Sarahlee Hansen
comment: Lots of issues since latest app. Keeps asking me to sign in and won't let me so I need to change password before it lets me sign in. No longer shows account/bill along top or linked in app. I tried manually adding my account (it says add account number once and you won't have to again) and it worked but when I exited out and went back in, the account was no longer there. It's easier to pay my monthly bill if it's linked in the app so please sort this ASAP

author: meg pom
comment: I liked this app b4, now it sucks, i could open it and see all my info, i could top up my or my sons ph. As well as the lock on my ph, I had a lock on the app to keep me safe. That was b4. Suddenly the latest update has stuffed everything up. I have to enter all my details, an email address and a password to look at my account. If i wanted that i wouldnt have a prepay ph, really spark this is stupid and makes me think you...spark.. have other agenda, i dont want ads on my email, i dont want to sign in every time, i wanted a simple prepay and a simple app so i could see my balances etc. Change it back or im going to change companies. Sad.

author: Neb Sun
comment: It's good for a quick check on my usage, topping up, and adding extras on prepaid... but latest version keeps asking to log in every time which is pretty annoying. often there is some 'technical issue' so it won't update for a while. there's no real point to keep asking to log in - it doesn't add any security, so it must be a bug. No response, so minus 1 star.

author: Stephen Coughlan
comment: An absolute joke for an app.. From an absolute joke of a company... 3-4 hrs waiting times... Call back service is a joke call you back and still on hold for another 15-30 mins... Costumer care haven't a clue what they are doing just reading off the same book. Try to resolve matters and you just end back at square one. You say you keep promises please ye don't even know what the word means

author: Kym Laing
comment: Having to sign in every time is an absolute pain, what kind of update is that?! Can't change my plan within the app, it's no longer the useful app it was unfortunately.

author: Robert Cooze
comment: Well Good News Bad News Colure Choice! Least now I can change the order of users and or what screen comes up first. But Wait you now have to log in Dayly? or every power off ? or set time? Spark sold me a Secure phone that uses biometrics and or retina scan as well as Geo locking and I still have to log in again and again? I still  prey I don't hit a buy now button! It is worse than you know but better than last time I wrote a review I have  the stars have been subtracted from last review
Hate it. Can't pull my info up. Can't see how many mins etc I have left. Want the older much better app back!!!

author: Joel Herbert
comment: Do slow compared to the Vodafone app(and 2 degrees) . Requires me to sign in every time! Does not have an overview of all the user's on my plan, i have to manually view them all which takes about 1 minute in total as there are about 7 users on my plan.

author: Jennifer Ngahooro
comment: Really annoying that both my husband and I have mobiles. I have used the App for ages ...as soon as he got the App it locked me out. We can't share the App even tho we have different cell numbers..
Used to work well and you could switch between numbers. Now you have to log in each number every time. I want the old version back!

author: Steven Coe
comment: Bug fixes seem to make things worse? Still having to supply details every time open, and no bug info supply avenue

author: David Whittaker
comment: What a waste of time bring the old version back why do I need to log in each time I want to check anything
Good application. Until the latest update which logged me out of the aplication for a certain period of time. Quite inconvenient for the users tbh.

author: Erin F
comment: This update is awful I can't get in to see usage or anything... and having to log in every time? No thanks

author: Beverley Pye
comment: Yes as some one said it sucks, bring back old version,  lest it was faster to open up, than this stupid new version,
Do I have to sign in every time I want to check something. Gonna change my phone company if not fixed soon.

author: Lizzie Clarke
comment: Literally does not work at all. Error message as soon as I open the app and cannot do a single thing.
Stupid app stupid company. Deleted my info now I can't access my info.

author: Steve Zdawczynski
comment: I'm a new user, can't sign up. Worthless.

author: Matthew McKenzie
comment: Can't change plan in the app. Just comes up with error.

author: John Huria
comment: Log in every time? Appalling.

author: Deane Gray
comment: Can't find my texts minutes etc...a jke really

author: Craig Marsh
comment: Logging in every time is a hassle

author: Louise Gray
comment: Used to be great to check usage and balances etc. Now app won't even let me log in so can't use it at all

author: Chamila De Silva
comment: Not working properly..

author: Michelle Drummond
comment: With the most recent update i cant log in. So i cant check anything its quite very anoying!

author: Simon Brant
comment: Constantly have to re-enter username and password.

author: Malele Tai
comment: It's so simple to use

author: Leonard Long
comment: Doesnt work at all, wont even start up.
Greate Create to check my data  ii usage

author: Paul Tupai
comment: No good

author: phill simmonds
comment: Very good

author: Kate Mcclintock
comment: cool

author: Dan Johnson
comment: Absolute waste of time. Keeps telling me there is no internet connection when I am sitting 2m away from the modem box. Tried many times to pay for my bill with no luck. Was not informed my bill was due so now I am overdue. Many times the app crashes and many times it tells you there is an error and unable to use app. I swear I spend more time getting frustrated with this app then using it. Only reason I keep app is because it's easy to use to pay my bill but seems I can't do that now. Must be time to uninstall. D-----

reply.author: Spark New Zealand Trading Limited
reply.content:
Hi Dan
Thank you for reaching out to us. There was a bug which has now been fixed.
Can you please try again and let us know how you go.
Can you please send us details of other issues you are facing at SmartphoneAppSupport@spark.co.nz.
Please include your account number or mobile number.
Apologies for the inconvenience.
Cheers
KA

author: heath douglas-monks
comment: I can't pay for my bill through the app and had no notification it was due so I am now over due... this needs to be sorted

author: Matt Ruddick
comment: Doesn't tell me how much shared data is left on business plan.. why show how much I've used when I can't see how much is left !!! I go over I have no idea why its not working good one Spark...

author: Rex Freeman
comment: A faulty app that isnt helped by a heavily flawed system, including unreliable wifi kiosks and the worst contact centre service Imaginable: short hours, extreme waiting times, incompetent, blasé staff, false promises and consistently incorrect information. 0/5.

author: Aidan Hodgkinson
comment: This app is getting worse and worse. I keep trying to set up an automatic payment and it keeps saying no connection with full wifi. Which is working in all other apps same for data. I turned the phone on and off cleared all apps no difference. This has happened a lot (not having con action when trying to use the app under the same conditions as above) and it is extremely annoying

reply.author: Spark New Zealand Trading Limited
reply.content:
Hi Aidan
Sorry to hear you are having issues. Can you please send us your account number and tell us the exact screen where you are getting this error. 
Please email us at smartphoneappsupport@spark.co.nz
Cheers
KA

author: Jacob Burke
comment: Get really mad when you want to pay your bill but all it says is sorry no internet connection when your got WiFi and mobile data. Needs fixing asap

reply.author: Spark New Zealand Trading Limited
reply.content:
Hi Jacob
Thank you for reaching out to us. There was a bug which has now been fixed.
Can you please try again and let us know how you go.
Apologies for the inconvenience.
Cheers
KA

author: Johnny Needham
comment: A lemon of an app from a lemon of a company. Repeatedly denying me access and reverting back to choosing my services after I have already chosen them numerous times. Visited a Spark store. The Spark worker set it up only for it to fail again and again meaning another trip to the Spark store or calling Mumbai for help !! A lemon.
